original_title: St. Patrick’s College wins close match against Jaffna College
original_body_lines: Colombo (News 1st) – St. Patrick's College, Jaffna beat Jaffna College, Vaddukoddai by a nervy 5 runs to clinch the 30th Rajan Kadirgamar Challenge Trophy One Day encounter.
After winning the toss and opting to bat, St. Patrick's College were bowled out for 225 in 47.5 overs.
Chasing 226 to win, Jaffna College narrowly fell short after being bowled out for 220 in 49.5 overs.
